titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R.1320) to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-35.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 303 - 110 (Record Vote No: 42).

bill.summary: 3/31/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1320 (land and water conservation fund programs).
